channel.title: Versions on JACOBI4
channel.description: Recent content in Versions on JACOBI4

item.title: JACOBI 4.3.21
item.description: Added inverse Box-Cox computation module. Added character-wise value splitting module. Added confidence interval computation in statistics module. Added non-numeric value handling in correlation module. Added cumulative statistics computation for eigenvalues in PCO module. Removed vector normalization in Gram-Schmidt process module. Fixed issues with Box-Cox computation. Fixed empty matrix handling in matrixShifter module. Dropped Windows XP support.

item.title: JACOBI 4.3.20
item.description: Added empty values handling in metric and normalization modules.

item.title: JACOBI 4.3.19
item.description: Added empty values handling in metric and normalization modules.

item.title: JACOBI 4.3.18
item.description: Added parameter for specifying the number of output columns in bootstrapLabels module. Fixed incorrect result when output file used as input in appendFile module.

item.title: JACOBI 4.3.17
item.description: Added bootstrapLabels module for generating weights for data labels. Fixed label naming in PLS regression module.

item.title: JACOBI 4.3.16
item.description: Added UMAP module. Added seed paramter for random number generator initialization in bootstrap and permutation modules. Added example for assigning variable value from file.

item.title: JACOBI 4.3.14
item.description: Added inclusion of the last element in the for loop. Added work-in-progress english documentation.

item.title: JACOBI 4.3.13
item.description: Fixed value duplication issue in for loop. Added work-in-progress english documentation.

item.title: JACOBI 4.3.12
item.description: Computing full matrix in compression distance instead of upper triangular one. Compressing object with oneself in compression distance module. Changed sign in “entropy” function in matrixOnElementsOperation module. Added mergeColumns module.

item.title: JACOBI 4.3.11
item.description: Fixed implicit conversion of non-number values to -1 in matrixOnElementsOperation module. Added “entropy” function to matrixOnElementsOperation module. Merged normalized_compression_distance and compress_metric into one module. Added Jaccard index to compression metric module.
